DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Drugs use chemotherapy use different way stop tumor cell divide stop grow die . PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness paclitaxel treat woman recurrent solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Paclitaxel Treating Women With Recurrent Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate relationship body surface area ( BSA ) toxic effect , BSA pharmacokinetics , pharmacokinetics toxic effect woman recurrent solid tumor receive fix total dose paclitaxel . II . Determine toxic effect paclitaxel patient . III . Assess pharmacokinetics paclitaxel patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive single fix dose intravenous paclitaxel 3 hour day 1 . Blood sample must draw prior first paclitaxel infusion 1 , 6 , 24 hour start infusion course 1 . Treatment course intravenous paclitaxel repeat every 3 week discretion treat physician . Patients evaluated response second course . Patients follow discretion physician . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 50 patient accrued 13 month .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically proven recurrent adult solid tumor Must measurable evaluable disease No known bone marrow metastasis PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Sex : Women Performance Status : Zubrod 02 Life Expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Absolute granulocyte count least 1,500/mm3 Platelet count least 100,000/mm3 Hepatic : Bilirubin le 1.5 mg/dL SGOT le 2.0 time upper limit normal Renal : Creatinine great 1.5 time upper limit normal Other : Concurrently active secondary malignancy allow PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : No prior paclitaxel therapy No 1 prior chemotherapy regimen metastatic disease At least 4 week since chemotherapy Greater 6 week since nitrosoureas , melphalan , mitomycin Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : At least 4 week since radiotherapy No prior whole pelvic radiation Surgery : At least 4 week since major surgery
DOC.keyword: unspecified adult solid tumor , protocol specific
